title: Maestro Error while im just sitting logged in to the client
body: I log into league and then after a little while its says lost connection to maestro. How do i fix this ?

replies.body:
Connection issues to Maestro are an indication that your link to our servers is *unstable*. This is typically caused by problematic network configurations local to your PC, so I'd recommend you work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
so i downloaded the hextech repair tool, clicked start, it said everything is good. Then i started league logged back in and it still does the same thing. I'm lost :(
The repair tool is only a small step in the list of steps inside that guide. Did you try all the rest before testing the changes?
I'm forced to uninstall and not play anymore if the problem isn't fixed.
